message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low yet. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This still leaves a decent profit margin for me while offering you a good deal. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,500, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $13,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
